storyInfo: The crisis may have been brought to a successful conclusion, but this holiday is not yet over. All the parties concerned feel differently about this turn of events.

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Hey, D.D.D. You're finally awake.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Waking up after catching some Z's is pretty normal, no?
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: You crashed straight into bed the moment you got back last night, though. That really had me worrying.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: How are things looking outside?
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: If you're asking about the city, it's just like before. Bustling.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: I heard a lot of people talking about what happened yesterday while I was having breakfast. Didn't seem like they care much, though.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Well, things already got pretty watered down.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Mayor Candela's amazing.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: With all that went down, nobody could've seen that coming.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: I was really shocked when I saw it on TV too.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: I've never seen anyone calm things down like that.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: And quite a few people actually went and fought the terrorists.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: I was right there. It just felt so bizarre.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Some of the terrorists were going straight after Ms. Candela, and they were really close.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: But she didn't even seem to care about that. All she cared about was getting the drones to the ship so she could get a good look at the action there.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: She was just standing, pointing at the screen and the sea while talking to the other spectators around her.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: It was like nothing that was happening was real.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: Then, those two girls showed up.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: It was like them being there dragged everything back to reality.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: It was so... so exciting!
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: So you want to create something.
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Ahaha, you know me well.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: How long have we known each other?
attributes.name: Manager

attributes.content: Yeah, that's right. I wanna create. I want to write a song that to document the fear, gratefulness, confusion that I feel right here right now.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: This is a song I'm writing for myself, but it's got to do with them.
attributes.name: D.D.D.

attributes.content: On its own, this city is a decent place.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: Leithania's musicals, Columbia's movies, and Bolívar's coffee. I've got to experience everything I wanted to try.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: But the people here are so boring. I got tired of playing with them about halfway through the competition.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: If I'd known this is how it would turn out in the end, I would've boarded the ship with Miss Ch'en after I made sure she was alright. I probably could've helped her that way.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: Oh well, I'm starting to be sick of this city. Maybe I'll check out wherever Miss Ch'en's going.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: I bet there are just as many nice people like her where she comes from.
attributes.name: Mizuki

attributes.content: That's way too reckless of you, Swire.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Uh-huh, yeah yeah yeah, okay, yeah. Fine, I got it. Why do I have to sit here and listen to you reprimand me again?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I left the L.G.D. in your hands, and you...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh, I know what I'm doing.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Besides, what about you? I thought you jumped ship to Rhodes Island to be an operator there, but here you are on a holiday!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I'm... Fine, you're right.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Come on, keep going. Why did you stop? I don't even remember the last time you two had an argument.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: We had one last time I went to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Eh, anyway, we're all here, and we got everything wrapped up. We should put all the unpleasant things behind us and have some fun instead.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Right, Ch'en?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: *Sigh*... right.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What's wrong? Are you still thinking about yesterday?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Yeah. I might've received the one honor that I don't ever want to receive in my entire life.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Haha, true. To be honest with you, even I thought that was pretty nasty.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: But it happened nonetheless.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Ch'en, there's not a whole lot in the world that goes exactly as you want but can still be called an absolute win for all parties concerned.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Okay, enough. If we're just gonna sit here and talk, we might as well go get some shopping done and stuff our faces with food to cheer ourselves up.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Let's go. I'm paying for lunch.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Now where's that stupid rat?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I think I saw her heading out early in the morning. Not sure where, though.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I have an inkling where she might be. I'll go find her.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Let me know when you do.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Hmph, she's been hiding from me since last night. She's dead as soon as I find her, I'm telling you.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I'm leaving you in charge of the place once I'm gone.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You remember everything I taught you, right?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Of course. You can rest assured it's in good hands.
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: What are you two chatting about?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh, Miss Ch'en. The boss is lecturing us right now.
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Don't tell her that. She might arrest you.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I'm not a cop anymore.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I've never seen such a big busybody of a tourist.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Leave us.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Casino Boss

attributes.content: Do you need something?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I doubt you looked everywhere just to have a drink with me.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: What if I tell you that's what I'm doing?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Then... let's have a drink.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I know the President of the Lungmen Young Entrepreneurs' Association to be a decisive, resolute person, strict on both herself and others.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And now I've finally seen her decisiveness for myself.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And the L.G.D. Special Inspection Unit Chief I know is an impartial person who shows criminals absolutely no mercy.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I finally had the pleasure to meet her.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Did Wei Yenwu send you here?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Lady Fumizuki sent me here as his representative.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: At first, I didn't understand why, but I figured it out when I saw you.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You aren't mad?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Not at all. This is an opportunity for me.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: The Rat King's daughter won't necessarily become the Rat King. But that also means she could be.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: So that's why you helped him?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I won't answer that, Hui-chieh.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Because I'm not like you.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You want to say I abandoned Lungmen.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The thought did cross my mind at first, but not anymore.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: This is a simple declarative sentence. I am not like you.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: That kind of grates on my ears.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's your problem.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Hoh.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hey, did you find that stinking rat yet?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: She's right here.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Where are you?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: In a bar on Coastal Highway 26.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The 26? Perfect. I see a decent place there. I'll send you the address. You two head on over and get us a table.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: And drag that ngong gau lou syu there if you have to. Don't let her get away.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You heard her.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Will that woman ever be less of a pain?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Shall we go?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: That's quite a lot of people on the beach.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The ship's one of the city's symbols. Now that it's sunk, people here are bound to be curious.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: The cruise ship, huh?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It doesn't matter what you think about it. We are the ones who blew it up. That's the truth.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: We should be thankful that Lady Candela wrote it off in exchange for our prize money.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: To be precise, you blew it up.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You had a better idea?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hmm? Who's that over there...?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Ernesto?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Miss Ch'en, Miss Lin.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Ms. Candela spared everyone except my father. Most of us are being exiled.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: She's only letting me stay because of my service in the past few years. Of course, I'm most definitely losing my job.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You're thinking of staying?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No, I'm planning to leave.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Rafaela and I are trying to figure out where to go. I spent the whole night thinking and still don't have anything. That's why I'm sitting here, gazing out at the sea to see if it gives me any ideas.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Rafaela is the little girl?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: That's right. She's the daughter of my father's old war friend, tío Pugh. He died rescuing my father from prison and entrusted her to him before he died.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Have you two given killing me here on the spot any thought?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I don't have the right to pass judgment on you, yet.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Had you succeeded, I'd kill you the moment we saw each other again. As for right now... I'll pass.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Haha, it's just like you two to say stuff like that.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Miss Ch'en, Miss Lin, I suppose, in Yan, they'd call me an unfilial son?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: We could also say you betrayed your father in the name of righteousness, but you aren't there yet.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hahaha, you're right. There wasn't anything righteous about what I did.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: The thought of betraying my father never crossed my mind during this operation, though.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Do you remember what I told you on the ship, Miss Ch'en? That wasn't a lie.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I'm not sure if this has crossed your mind during your time here.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I know very well what this city was built on top of.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: However, whenever I look at the skyscrapers and the blue sky up above, I can't help but feel that there is some sort of legitimacy to it.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I can't think of it any other way.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But you choose to leave now.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: To tell the truth, if it wasn't for you two, I think I would willingly stay here and work under her.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But your words left me bewildered.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You two are foreigners. Perhaps, elsewhere, things could have been different.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Phew... It feels much better now that I got that off my chest.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Thank you for not bludgeoning me to death the moment you saw me, much less listening to me talk about all this.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: It's all a matter of perspective.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Well, I'm done bothering you. I will likely be around for a little longer. Please don't hesitate to come to me if you need me for anything.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I can't help him...
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Neither can... What do you mean?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I just think it's a pity to leave him wallowing in misery like that.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I'll think about it...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hey, Ch'en.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hello.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We were just leaving the city hall, and Ms. Swire here invited us to lunch with you.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: I see. How did your talks with the mayor go?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Thanks to you, we've played a role in this little incident. The mayor didn't think twice before she agreed.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: It's just like her to do that.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Finally caught you, you stupid rat!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I wasn't running away. Perhaps you've got a few loose screws, Beatrix.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You're the one who's got loose screws!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Most girls aren't so jealous of their friends going on a holiday that they follow them there in secret.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I'm built different!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Right, Missy said we'll be going shopping in the afternoon. Grabbing souvenirs, too, while we're at it. Ch'en, Miss Lin, how about it?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The stupid rat has to come.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Fine, I don't have much else to do.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Let's go get lunch, then.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Hey, you four, come. Pose for me.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: It just occurred to me this could make a really great picture. I'll snap one for you. Something like a memento of your holiday.
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.content: Sounds lovely. Hey, ugly rat, it's time for a picture. Get in.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Whatever.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Haha, it's not often that the four of us get to spend time together. How about it, Ch'en?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Alright. 3, 2, 1, cheese—!
attributes.name: Sideroca

attributes.text: Dossoles's handground coffee is known for its unique aroma, and the finest of the finest has a particularly rich fragrance.
Even before you take a sip of the coffee, you are blessed with its aroma, and while your first sip may seem bitter, you will be greeted with its true, fine flavor soon thereafter.
It is tart, but not overly so. It is fragrant, but it does not overwhelm. Above all, it leaves a rich aftertaste. Even the most demanding critics find no faults in its many qualities.
Some Leithanien nobles even compete against each other in the procurement of Dossoles's finest coffee, and whoever that has the most has the definitive standing in their social circles.
A small cup of this rare coffee is now in the Chief of Lungmen Wei Yenwu's hand, its aroma wafting in the air.

attributes.content: Are you reading Yühsia's report on her trip to Dossoles?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Yes, I am. It's been a while since I last saw Candela. It sounds like she hasn't changed. A crazed woman, as always.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You dare say you're not like her?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Of course I'm not like her.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: From what the Messengers I sent there told me, Yühsia and our little Ch'en did really well.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: I am not quite sure why the young lady of the Schwire family and Hoshiguma were there, however.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: They did a wonderful job, indeed.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But my guess is they weren't very happy about it themselves.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: You said Candela wouldn't dare to hurt them. I agree.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But they are still too young to know how to endure her generosity.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: That woman doesn't see right and wrong. Results are the only thing that matters.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: So you're beating around the bush, trying to tell me I should never have sent the two of them there?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: No, quite the opposite. You're right. There was no harm done in letting them see the sights there.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: My, it's not often you say something so nice.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: In that case, let me show you something nice as well.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: It's a photo that Yühsia brought back.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Look, isn't it wonderful? All of them are so young, so full of energy.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: That used to be us. Do you remember?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Of course I remember.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I'll sleep better knowing Ch'en is doing well.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: I'll frame this picture and cherish it forever.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: As long as you're happy.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Yenwu.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Is our little Ch'en going to come back?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I'm glad.
attributes.name: Fumizuki
